items.title: Kids who use social media score lower on reading and memory tests, a study shows
items.description: Data from a large, ongoing study of adolescents shows a link between increasing social media use and lower cognition and memory in teens.

items.title: Highlighting Indigenous stories from across NPR's network
items.description: NPR is highlighting Indigenous stories from across its network in celebrations of Indigenous Peoples Day.

items.title: Media companies thought late night TV was irrelevant. Kimmel proved them wrong
